page.title: netUpb's Bail Mod Text
page.descr: Text for the missions created by netUpb
page.t: Updated {1134020, 1020}, Globals Is Setting to Defaults
This category shows cleanup bailed and abandoned ships.
It's time to destroy, but the player is in this sector. This ship will not be destroyed until the player changes sectors.
Reports the bail information of other ships on the logbook.
Show the player's bail capture status in the notification window.
Report for sectors containing advanced satellites of the player.
Report for sectors where the player does not have satellites.
Increasing the value %s the frequency of Bail spawns.
Reports the bail information of other ships on the Show Help popup window.
Reports the bail information of other ships with sound notification.
Toggle On/Off bail checks of attacks made on target ship's %s from Player piloted ship.
Toggle On/Off bail checks of attacks made on target ship's %s from Player owned ships or stations.
Toggle On/Off bail checks of attacks made on target ship's %s from NPC owned ships or stations.
Toggle On/Off bail checks attacks on target ship from any Laser Towers.
If the shield percentage is at or below this value, the eject event starts.
If the hull percentage is at or below this value, the eject event starts.
Base chance percentage for target personnel to be ejected.
The base chance will be adjusted when the target's hull percentage drops to or below this value.
Next value based on eject chance adjust.
The base chance will be adjusted again when the target's hull percentage drops to or below this value.
Later value based on eject chance adjust
Time to wait for the next eject check.
What is the minimum percentage of the ship's personnel that should be ejected each time there is an ejection?
What is the maximum percentage of the ship's personnel that should be ejected each time there is an ejection?
when the hull percentage falls to this value or below, a check event is required to remove all crew members.
When the ship is bailed out, let its cargo be removed.
Time to destroy bailed %s class ships.
Toggle On/Off Report for bailed %s class ships.
When a bailed ship is claimed the armor will be fully repaired.
When a bailed ship is claimed, full shield.
When the bailed ship is claimed, all equipments (shields, turrets, engines etc..) must be fully repaired.
Is write some importans to debugtext? It is only effective when running the game with debug mod support.
Is write more detail importans to debugtext? It is only effective when running the game with debug mod support.
Cleaning time of debug files content.
Is write Player attacks to log file? It is only effective when running the game with debug mod support.
Is write PlayerOwned ships or stations attacks to log file? It is only effective when running the game with debug mod support.
Is write NPC ships or stations attacks to log file? It is only effective when running the game with debug mod support.
Is write Detector for NPC Attacks to log file? It is only effective when running the game with debug mod support.
Is write Detector for Playewrowned Attacks to log file? It is only effective when running the game with debug mod support.
Is write Abandoned Bailed Ships to log file? It is only effective when running the game with debug mod support.
Is write Abandoned Bailed Ships logFile in append mode? It is only effective when running the game with debug mod support.
Attacks on equipments, other than attacks on the ship's armor, affect the bail event.
